body: Hi all, I created different views to show glare analysis, but it just shows rhino's active view in grasshopper's environment. Also, all of the times I set for the analysis has an imperceptible DGP which seems irregular. I wanna know where the problem is? The rhino and grasshopper file is attached here. Thanks in advance Masoome [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/UyG2hh6alTCQhI4kmkMax0mm*K5zVwdi-4gqgtUIEjb0n1*shX5ZGAiD1rpMIDxGgOtRUNA4HZ-m1qVAuJvifYDYiGxt941E/1.PNG)

replies.body: Masoome, Did you connected the view names to the recipe?
Yes I did. As you see in this image: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/PG2F6G76DOmGDBHiqTBBU-ocw6vtqjcinPmYFbn4CAMbpzEwnvL8RoIf6*YyZakjWY2fJDEdIo77I-o0Ld2sKS3Y3ZLU-4Qr/qq.PNG)
